wikipedia_page.main: George Barry Lupino-Hook (7 January 1884 – 26 September 1962)  was an English comedian and film actor, and a notable Pantomime dame.He was the brother of the actor and comedian Stanley Lupino, the father of the actress Antoinette Lupino, and the uncle of the actresses Ida and Rita Lupino.Lupino was married three times, to Gertrude Letchford, Mary Georgina Gordon Anstruther and Doriel M. Phillips.
